basic_information.scholarship_name: Clint Rohr and Brian Gorrell Endowed Scholarship in Jazz Studies- NOMINATION

description: The recipient(s) of the Clint Rohr and Brian Gorrell Endowed Scholarship in Jazz Studies will be selected by faculty nomination. The recipient(s) will be selected in the spring for distribution the following fall and spring semesters. Eligibility Requirements Recipient must be nominated and selected by members of the jazz studies division faculty Open to fulltime undergraduate or graduate students of sophomore level or above Minimum 2.0 GPA

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
